name: Roo.View

params.name: config
params.desc: The config object

config.name: selectedClass
config.desc: The css class to add to selected nodes

config.name: listeners
dataName
config.desc:
the named area of the template to use as the data area
                         Works with domtemplates roo-name="name"

config.name: emptyText
config.desc: The empty text to show when nothing is loaded.

config.name: store
config.desc: Data store to load data from.

config.name: tpl
config.desc: The template used by this View

methods.name: getSelectedNodes
methods.desc: Get the currently selected nodes.

methods.name: getNodes
methods.desc: Gets a range template nodes.

methods.name: select
methods.desc: Selects nodes.

params.name: nodeInfo
params.desc: An HTMLElement template node, index of a template node, id of a template node or an array of any of those to select

params.name: keepExisting
params.desc: (optional) true to keep existing selections

params.name: suppressEvent
params.desc: (optional) true to skip firing of the selectionchange vent

methods.name: clearSelections
methods.desc: Clear all selections

params.name: suppressEvent
params.desc: (optional) true to skip firing of the selectionchange event

methods.name: isSelected
methods.desc: Returns true if the passed node is selected

params.name: node
params.desc: The node or node index

methods.name: refresh
methods.desc: Refreshes the view. - called by datachanged on the store. - do not call directly.

methods.name: onBeforeLoad
methods.desc: onbeforeLoad - masks the loading area.

methods.name: getSelectedIndexes
methods.desc: Get the indexes of the selected nodes.

methods.name: indexOf
methods.desc: Finds the index of the passed node

params.name: nodeInfo
params.desc: An HTMLElement template node, index of a template node or the id of a template node

returns.desc: The index of the node or -1

methods.name: getEl
methods.desc: Returns the element this view is bound to.

methods.name: setStore
methods.desc: Changes the data store this view uses and refresh the view.

methods.name: refreshNode
methods.desc: Refresh an individual node.

methods.name: prepareData
methods.desc:
Function to override to reformat the data that is sent to
the template for each node.
DEPRICATED - use the preparedata event handler.

params.name: data
params.desc:
The raw data (array of colData for a data model bound view or
a JSON object for an UpdateManager bound view).

methods.name: getSelectionCount
methods.desc: Get the number of selected nodes.

methods.name: findItemFromChild
methods.desc: Returns the template node the passed child belongs to or null if it doesn't belong to one.

methods.name: unselect
methods.desc: Unselects nodes.

params.name: nodeInfo
params.desc: An HTMLElement template node, index of a template node, id of a template node or an array of any of those to select

params.name: keepExisting
params.desc: (optional) true IGNORED (for campatibility with select)

params.name: suppressEvent
params.desc: (optional) true to skip firing of the selectionchange vent

methods.name: getNode
methods.desc: Gets a template node.

params.name: nodeInfo
params.desc: An HTMLElement template node, index of a template node or the id of a template node

returns.desc: The node or null if it wasn't found

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to release

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

returns.desc: returns false if any of the handlers return false otherwise it returns true

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

returns.desc: True if the event is being listened for, else false

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to capture

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to call

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: dblclick
events.desc: Fires when a template node is double clicked.

params.name: index
params.desc: The index of the target node

params.name: node
params.desc: The target node

params.name: e
params.desc: The raw event object

events.name: preparedata
events.desc: Fires on every row to render, to allow you to change the data.

params.name: data
params.desc: to be rendered (change this)

events.name: selectionchange
events.desc: Fires when the selected nodes change.

params.name: selections
params.desc: Array of the selected nodes

events.name: beforeselect
events.desc: Fires before a selection is made. If any handlers return false, the selection is cancelled.

params.name: node
params.desc: The node to be selected

params.name: selections
params.desc: Array of currently selected nodes

events.name: beforeclick
events.desc: Fires before a click is processed. Returns false to cancel the default action.

params.name: index
params.desc: The index of the target node

params.name: node
params.desc: The target node

params.name: e
params.desc: The raw event object

events.name: click
events.desc: Fires when a template node is clicked.

params.name: index
params.desc: The index of the target node

params.name: node
params.desc: The target node

params.name: e
params.desc: The raw event object

events.name: contextmenu
events.desc: Fires when a template node is right clicked.

params.name: index
params.desc: The index of the target node

params.name: node
params.desc: The target node

params.name: e
params.desc: The raw event object
